DOC.detailed_description: Percutaneous ablation safe effective therapy cirrhotic patient HCC resection liver transplantation possible . Among various percutaneous local ablative therapy , radiofrequency ablation ( RFA ) attract great interest effectiveness safety single HCC ≤ 5.0cm ≤3 HCC nodules ≤3cm . Some study show laser ablation ( LA ) may effective RFA treatment HCC . However , RFA LA different technique , different case ( example : size site HCC nodule ) , procedure may advantage disadvantage . Therefore need prospective randomize control study compare RFA LA patient small HCC .
